name: Kuliza
description:
Kuliza is a software development company that builds web, mobile and social experiences for global clients since September 2006. Kuliza's team of agile developers has expertise building scalable web apps, innovative social and mobile apps, high-performing media and e-commerce sites and smart big data apps. 
Offerings
Our offerings include:
Enterprise consumer facing applications: Today, enterprises require robust & scalable consumer facing applications. Kuliza provides a winning mix of UX, design and backend engineering to create enterprise applications that your consumers will love
E-commerce applications: Kuliza designs and engineers end-to-end E-commerce applications to boost online sales
News and media publishing engines: Kuliza builds next generation news and media publishing engines to give consumers digital destinations for a second screen experience
Enterprise mobility: Increasingly as users go mobile everyday, Kuliza assists enterprises get mobile ready in order to enable their products and digital destinations. 
Product development for venture backed startups: Kuliza has helped multiple startups build and enhance products as their technology partner, while they focus on core competencies.
Key Technologies
UI Development: HTML5, CSS3, Angular JS, jQuery
Web Development: Ruby on rails, Python, Django, Drupal, Java, Node JS, Spring, Bottle, Hibernate, Play
Mobile App Development: Android, iOS, WIndows 8
Databases: MySQL, SQL Server, Mongo DB, Oracle, Amazon Simple DB
